channel.title: Freesurfer on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in Freesurfer on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Setting up a Freesurfer LMM through R
item.description: Learn to create model matrices for Freesurfer Linear Mixed Models (LMM) in R using built-in functions. This guide walks you through manually creating model matrices, utilizing the model.matrix function, and standardizing variables. Includes creating a function to streamline the process, making neuroimaging data analysis more efficient.
